messageBody:
So said noahgreen2000 on 2002-10-25

>Hi all,
>Here's a question for possible JUnit FAQ inclusion:
>
>"How do I pass command-line arguments to a test execution?"

I have using JVM arguments, with success. I would even suggest a
properties file. It is likely that you'll have more configuration
parameters. Better to limit the number of parameters to pass to the JVM
to one, so create a properties file and make its location a parameter
to the JVM running your tests.
